title: Super Mario 64
description: Super Mario 64 is a 3 dimensional platform game where you progress through the game by leaping through different terrains and stomping on grumpy Goombas. This childhood game has made an incredible mark in the platform gaming industry. Super Mario 64 is growing in popularity within the speedracing realm, where players must complete certain levels of a game within a short period of time.

title: Metal Gear Solid 5 Phantom Pain
description: An open world stealth game produced by Kojima Productions where you play as an operative, Big Boss, and progress through the open world terrains through stealth mechanics and a powerful narrative.
